raw_mentions:
The thermodynamic binding constant was determined to be 8.4 (±1.0)×10^5 M^−1.
Similar DNA photocleavage titrations at other mismatch sites have measured the affinity of Δ [Rh(bpy)2(chrysi)]^3+ between 1×10^7 and 3×10^5 M^−1.
To examine the level of selectivity, the average binding constant of Δ [Rh(bpy)2(chrysi)]^3+ to B-form DNA was also determined. 
Photocleavage on a 33mer correctly matched hairpin and competitive titration with unlabeled 25mer B-DNA yielded a value of 4 (±2)×10^4 M^−1 for the average non-specific binding affinity.
